# OSCompareAndSwap64

**Function**

64-bit compare and swap operation.

## Declaration

```swift
Boolean OSCompareAndSwap64(UInt64 oldValue, UInt64 newValue, volatile UInt64 *address);
```

## Discussion

See OSCompareAndSwap.

## Compare and Swap

- **OSCompareAndSwap**: Compare and swap operation, performed atomically with respect to all devices that participate in the coherency architecture of the platform.
- **OSCompareAndSwapPtr**: Compare and swap operation, performed atomically with respect to all devices that participate in the coherency architecture of the platform.
